data.title: Flight offers: Almaty to Yekaterinburg - eDreams
data.meta_description: Book flights from Almaty to Yekaterinburg with eDreams. Find deals, get tips on best times to visit, weather and more about your destination.
data.text:
What are the benefits of booking flexible flight tickets?

Using the flexible flight ticket, you're guaranteed a refund or a rebooking option (without fees) in case of flight cancellations when travelling to Russia. At eDreams have you covered!

If I want to book flights from Almaty to Yekaterinburg at eDreams, how can I find them?

At eDreams, by using machine learning technologies, we are able to find the cheapest options to fly from Almaty to Yekaterinburg. This takes into consideration different factors such as price, stopovers, airline options and more.

Is Yekaterinburg more expensive than Almaty to visit?

Comparing taxi prices, a ride in Yekaterinburg costs an average of 1.74 GBP pounds, 115% more expensive than Almaty, with a fare of 0.81 GBP pounds, while train tickets cost 81% more in Yekaterinburg: 0.29 GBP pounds against 0.16 GBP pounds in Almaty. Comparing the price of a meal, they range from 6.08 GBP euros in Yekaterinburg, 6% less than the 6.47 GBP euros in Almaty. The price of a coffee is approximately 17% cheaper in Yekaterinburg, with an average of 1.52 GBP euros, while in Almaty the coffee costs 1.83 GBP.

What is the weather like in Yekaterinburg compared to Almaty?

The average temperature in Almaty is 36.3 degrees in summer, with precipitation around 2.3 mm ,Yekaterinburg's temperatures reach 29.05 during the hot season, with 3.0 average of rain rate . In winter, however, weather indicators show around -29.88 degrees in Yekaterinburg, compared to the -19.51 average degrees reported in Almaty. During the winter period, Almaty can register 0.9 mm precipitation, while Yekaterinburg have an average of 0.3 mm rain level.
